subtitleNullable: Examining Demographics, Coverage Status, and Confidence Intervals
descriptionNullable:
_____
# Health Insurance Coverage Status (BRFSS - NYS)
### Examining Demographics, Coverage Status, and Confidence Intervals
By Health Data New York [[source]](https://data.world/healthdatany)
_____

### About this dataset
> This dataset provides an in-depth look at New York State adult health care coverage status from 2007 to 2010. Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) sample data have been used to generate annual percentages of non-institutionalized adult (18+) NYS residents with/without health insurance coverage. This curated dataset also includes a range of demographic and geographic categories, including: New York City/Rest of State, Sex, Race/Ethnicity, Age, Education, Income Limitation Status, Employment Status and Mental Health Status - allowing for more cross-sectional analysis. 
> 
> Using the BRFSS system -random digit dialing phone survey-, this dataset provides information for between 6,000 and 9,000 completed interviews per year through this timeframe. This is particularly relevant since data for 2011 forward are available elsewhere*.  Before using the data associated to this dataset please note the access license requirements** contained within its Terms of Service.   
> 
>  (*data link *) **(Terms of Service link)

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 


### Research Ideas
> - Analyzing trends in health care coverage between different demographic groups over time.
> - Identifying any disparities in access to health care between different demographic groups and generating strategies to address them.
> - Identifying areas that have experienced significant changes in health care coverage over time, so that special attention can be paid to addressing issues within those regions or communities

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://data.world/healthdatany)
> 
>


### License
> 
> 
> See the dataset description for more information.

### Columns

**File: health-care-coverage-status-brfss-2007-2010-1.csv**
| Column name                                  | Description                                                                              |
|:---------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Characteristic**                           | The characteristic being measured. (String)                                              |
| **Year**                                     | The year the data was collected. (Integer)                                               |
| **Demographic Category**                     | The demographic category being measured. (String)                                        |
| **Demographic Group**                        | The demographic group being measured. (String)                                           |
| **Overall Sample Size**                      | The total number of individuals in the sample. (Integer)                                 |
| **Overall Population Size**                  | The total number of individuals in the population. (Integer)                             |
| **Sample Cases with Characteristic**         | The number of individuals in the sample with the characteristic. (Integer)               |
| **Estimated Population with Characteristic** | The estimated number of individuals in the population with the characteristic. (Integer) |
| **Percentage with Characteristic**           | The percentage of individuals in the population with the characteristic. (Float)         |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [Health Data New York](https://data.world/healthdatany).
